law.catch_line: In Prince George's County, the subdivision regulations may provide for:...
law.text:
In Prince George's County, the subdivision regulations may provide for:
the classification of a subdivision as a major or minor subdivision; and
a sketch plan that:
in the case of a minor subdivision, may be approved by the planning director and filed as the record plat; and
in the case of a major subdivision, may be required before the submission of a preliminary plan of subdivision.
